article.description: Mount St. Mary's, Md. 70, Loyola, Md. 58
article.headline: Mount St. Mary's, Md. 70, Loyola, Md. 58
article.linkText: Mount St. Mary's, Md. 70, Loyola, Md. 58
article.story: EMMITSBURG, Md. (AP) -- Jeremy Goode had 22 points and nine assists to lead previously winless Mount St. Mary's over in-state rival Loyola 70-58 on Saturday night. Chris Vann scored 16 points and Will Holland had 13 for the Mountaineers (1-4), who outscored Loyola 31-9 during a 15-minute stretch that spanned both halves. Vann had 11 points and Goode had nine during the run, which staked the Mountaineers to a 47-30 lead. Gerald Brown led the Greyhounds (4-4) with 12 points. After his layup gave Loyola a 21-16 lead, the Mount held the Greyhounds scoreless over the final 7:41 of the first half. Mount St. Mary's led 27-21 at halftime.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
